sn23.23:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma radho bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn23.23:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn23.23:2.1: “Yo kho, radha, maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn23.23:2.3: Rupam kho, radha, maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn23.23:2.4: Vedana maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.23:2.5: sanna maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.23:2.6: sankhara maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.23:2.7: vinnanam maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.23:2.8: yo kho, radha, maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
